name: cost_option
description: The cost option table contains the costs of a service at certain points in time. This is an LGA Extension table. This table provides a structured version of the text information contained in the 'fees' field of the 'service' table.

id.name: id
id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier

service_id.name: service_id
service_id.description: The identifier of the services for which the entry describes the cost

valid_from.name: valid_from
valid_from.description: When this price is valid from

valid_to.name: valid_to
valid_to.description: When this price is valid to

option.name: option
option.description:
Conditions associated with the cost option.

Application Profile Notes: e.g.For the over 60's
1st session

amount.name: amount
amount.description: The cost of the option, expresssed as an amount in a currency (expected to be GBP by Open Referral UK).

amount_description.name: amount_description
amount_description.description: Specific details qualifying the cost amount, e.g. 'per session'
